item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

COSTUME CONTEST on Saturday OCT 30th.

We will be Celebrating Halloween with a COSTUME contest so make sure you dress up if you want to be part of the contest. There will be a PRIZE for the BEST COSTUME.

Last years Costume party was a huge success and a lot of fun, don't miss
out on this years.

** COSTUME CONTEST $$$$$$$$$$$$ **

** KARAOKE in the LOUNGE **

** Great DJ in the BLUE ROOM mixing their R&B, Hip Hop and Latin music all night long**

• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Fire Place
• Premium Liquor
• (COMPLIMENTARY FOOD)
• POOL TABLES
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $7.00 Cover charge
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
item.name: HALLOWEEN PARTAAAY II
